kickstart.description:
Sets up the 411 Secure Information Service for clients. The 411 service will automatically configure itself when a file is published.
Also puts all current 411 files from the frontend into the kickstart file for services that cannot tolerate a single 411 failure.
Note that 411 can never guarentee full absolute success at any single time. It only offers consistancy over the long term.
